amendment.description: Amendment freezes the current funding level for the National Science Foundation's Social, Behavioral, and Economic Sciences directorate by reducing the FY 2015 funding amount by $15,350,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce and then increase the funding for research and related activities, National Science Foundation, by $15,350,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 208 - 201 (Roll no. 252).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 208 - 201 (Roll no. 252).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Smith (TX).
